data.lyric:
[ti:Tell Me U Luv Me (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD/Trippie Redd]
[al:Tell Me U Luv Me (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Tell Me U Luv Me (Explicit) - Juice WRLD/Trippie Redd
[00:00.35]Lyrics by：Nick Mira/Jarad Higgins/Michael White/Tanner Katich
[00:00.71]Composed by：Nick Mira/Jarad Higgins/Michael White/Tanner Katich
[00:01.07]Trippie Redd：
[00:08.91]Tell me you love me tell me everything gon' be okay
[00:12.57]Tell me you love me tell me you love me and you gon' stay
[00:16.33]Tell me you love me tell me you love me won't go nowhere
[00:20.05]Tell me you love me tell me you love me
[00:23.47]Juice WRLD：
[00:23.93]B***h I'm a d**ggie so can you hide my d**gs from me
[00:27.41]When I get lonely can you be my company
[00:31.27]D**gs to the brain swervin' inside of a Benz truck
[00:34.51]I cannot stay in my lane um yes I got you in my brain duh
[00:39.30]Um you can't hide you can't run um we're forever in love
[00:46.98]Um if you leave there'd be torment torment torment torment
[00:53.76]Don't run from me you can't have it any other way
[00:57.37]It's me or no one
[00:58.81]If you leave I'll take your life away like you were no one
[01:02.91]So tell me you love me tell me you love me
[01:06.45]Tell me it'll be okay
[01:08.01]Trippie Redd：
[01:08.90]Tell me you love me tell me everything gon' be okay
[01:12.60]Tell me you love me tell me you love me and you gon' stay
[01:16.26]Tell me you love me tell me you love me won't go nowhere
[01:20.03]Tell me you love me tell me you love me
[01:22.91]Juice WRLD：
[01:23.19]Heart on my sleeve ball with it like a throwback
[01:24.64]Mind in the clouds I will never ever come back home
[01:27.03]You fightin' through a text using all caps
[01:28.55]F**k this screw that you saying to send you back home
[01:30.81]Well baby girl I don't want to do that
[01:32.20]It's true that you the only home I know
[01:34.09]Without you all it ever does is snow
[01:35.75]My voice too deep for a average ho
[01:37.74]Babe welcome to my world dark and confusin'
[01:39.68]Get lost in it often the same way I'm lost in you
[01:42.02]And it's often my mind that I'm losin'
[01:43.51]See half of it stuck in a pill bottle high and confused
[01:45.62]Don't even know what the f**k I be doin'
[01:47.27]Pray everyday that I'm far from a nuisance
[01:49.16]Tryna figure out how to live with the blueprints
[01:51.00]To give you the heart out my chest 'cause I know that it's true
[01:53.08]Juice WRLD：
[01:54.50]I know that it's true
[01:56.58]I know that
[01:57.60]I know that
[01:58.34]To give you the heart out my chest because I know that it's true
[02:02.97]So tell me you love me
[02:04.29]Tell me you love me
[02:05.13]Tell me you love me
[02:05.99]Tell me you love me
[02:06.88]Tell me you love me
[02:07.76]Tell me you love me
[02:08.70]Trippie Redd：
[02:09.06]Tell me you love me tell me everything gon' be okay
[02:12.56]Tell me you love me tell me you love me and you gon' stay
[02:16.26]Tell me you love me tell me you love me won't go nowhere
[02:19.97]Tell me you love me tell me you love me
[02:23.87]Tell me you love me tell me everything gon' be okay
[02:27.54]Tell me you love me tell me you love me and you gon' stay
[02:31.23]Tell me you love me tell me you love me won't go nowhere
[02:34.99]Tell me you love me tell me you love me
data.trans:
[ti:Tell Me U Luv Me (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD/Trippie Redd]
[al:Tell Me U Luv Me (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.35]//
[00:00.71]//
[00:01.07]//
[00:08.91]告诉我 你爱我 告诉我 一切都会好好的
[00:12.57]告诉我 你爱我 告诉我 你爱我 你会留在我身边
[00:16.33]告诉我 你爱我 告诉我 你爱我 哪儿也不会去
[00:20.05]告诉我 你爱我 告诉我 你爱我
[00:23.47]//
[00:23.93]碧池 我沉迷那种东西 所以 你能否把那些东西藏起来 不让我发现
[00:27.41]当我孤单时 你能否陪伴我
[00:31.27]已经有点上头了 开着奔驰到处跑
[00:34.51]我无法控制自己 平静不下来 脑海里想的全是你
[00:39.30]你不能躲 你不能逃 我们永远相爱着
[00:46.98]如果你离我而去 我会悲痛欲绝
[00:53.76]不要逃离我 你也没有其他选择
[00:57.37]除了我 谁都不行
[00:58.81]如果你离我而去 我会要了你的命 好像你是个无名小辈
[01:02.91]所以 告诉我 你爱我 告诉我 你爱我
[01:06.45]告诉我 会没事的
[01:08.01]//
[01:08.90]告诉我 你爱我 告诉我 一切都会好好的
[01:12.60]告诉我 你爱我 告诉我 你爱我 你会留在我身边
[01:16.26]告诉我 你爱我 告诉我 你爱我 哪儿也不会去
[01:20.03]告诉我 你爱我 告诉我 你爱我
[01:22.91]//
[01:23.19]对你敞开心怀 对你没有一丝保留
[01:24.64]心不在焉 魂不守舍 我永远不会回家了
[01:27.03]你用短信和我争吵 所有字母都是大写
[01:28.55]去他的 不管了 你叫我送你回家去
[01:30.81]宝贝姑娘 我不想那样做
[01:32.20]你就是我唯一的家 真的
[01:34.09]没有你 我的世界冰天雪地
[01:35.75]我的思想对于普通女人来说太深奥
[01:37.74]宝贝 欢迎来到我黑暗又令人困惑的世界
[01:39.68]迷失在其中 就像我为你而迷失一样
[01:42.02]我经常会失去理智
[01:43.51]我的脑子已经被药物吞噬了一半 兴奋又困惑
[01:45.62]我甚至不懂自己在做什么
[01:47.27]每天都祈祷着远离那些讨厌的事情
[01:49.16]很想搞明白 到底怎样才能按照预想的过活
[01:51.00]把我的心交给你 因为我知道我是真心的
[01:53.08]//
[01:54.50]我知道我是真心的
[01:56.58]我知道
[01:57.60]我知道
[01:58.34]把我的心交给你 因为我知道我是真心的
[02:02.97]所以 告诉我 你爱我
[02:04.29]告诉我 你爱我
[02:05.13]告诉我 你爱我
[02:05.99]告诉我 你爱我
[02:06.88]告诉我 你爱我
[02:07.76]告诉我 你爱我
[02:08.70]//
[02:09.06]告诉我 你爱我 告诉我 一切都会好好的
[02:12.56]告诉我 你爱我 告诉我 你爱我 你会留在我身边
[02:16.26]告诉我 你爱我 告诉我 你爱我 哪儿也不会去
[02:19.97]告诉我 你爱我 告诉我 你爱我
[02:23.87]告诉我 你爱我 告诉我 一切都会好好的
[02:27.54]告诉我 你爱我 告诉我 你爱我 你会留在我身边
[02:31.23]告诉我 你爱我 告诉我 你爱我 哪儿也不会去
[02:34.99]告诉我 你爱我 告诉我 你爱我
